description: This recipe has evolved over time and is a great way to sneak some extra veggies into the kids!
name: Sneaky Sausage Rolls Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 3 slice bread (day old or lightly toasted)
1 broccoli, finely chopped, not the stalks (medium head of broccoli)
1-2 tbs tomato paste or pizza sauce

recipeInstructions.text: Heat olive oil in a pan, add onions and sauté until soft. Pre heat oven fan forced oven to 200 celsius.
In a large bowl combine mince, grated carrot, chopped broccoli, lentils, broken up pieces of bread, tomato paste and sautéed onion. Use your hands!

Cut a sheet of pastry in half. Spoon mixture along centre of sheet and make a long sausage shape. Roll pastry over to create the sausage roll shape. Cut in half again to make 2 large sausage rolls or into bite sized pieces if you prefer.
Place sausage roll onto an oven tray with baking paper on it, with joined edge facing down. Wash with egg.
Cook in oven for approximately 25 minutes or until golden. Serve with Tomato sauce. Suitable to freeze - if they last that long!
